definition: calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

pinyin: wei1 ji1 fen1 ji1 ben3 ding4 li3

sentences.english: My most abstruse class was Advanced Calculus Mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 最深邃難明的課非微積分莫屬。

sentences.english: The name of the co-discoverer, with Newton, of calculus?
sentences.chinese: 和牛頓同時發現微積分的人叫什麼名字？

sentences.english: It's been awhile since I did calculus.
sentences.chinese: 我學微積分已經有一段時間了。

sentences.english: Many readers will have taken a calculus course in their undergraduate training.
sentences.chinese: 許多讀者都在大學期間接收過微積分課程的訓練。

sentences.english: Agnesi is credited with writing the first book discussing both differential and integral calculus .
sentences.chinese: 阿涅澤因撰寫了第一本討論微積分的書而聲名鵲起。

sentences.english: We have to factor that into the calculus.
sentences.chinese: 我們要在微積分學中考慮這些因素。

sentences.english: But, calculus, really, is about studying functions.
sentences.chinese: 但是微積分，主要是學習函數的。

sentences.english: He invented calculus and investigated the nature of light.
sentences.chinese: 他創立了微積分學，探索了光的本質。

sentences.english: And here, it's the same thing in multivariable calculus.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，在多元微積分裏面也一樣。

sentences.english: You can’t do a calculus class without first taking (and understanding) an Algebra and a Trigonometry class.
sentences.chinese: 沒有三角學和代數學的知識你不會理解微積分。

sentences.english: And for that you didn't need multivariable calculus.
sentences.chinese: 並沒有用到多元微積分。

sentences.english: We won't take a calculous class until next term.
sentences.chinese: 可咱們下學期纔要修微積分。

sentences.english: We won't take a calculus class until next term.
sentences.chinese: 可咱們下學期纔要修微積分。

sentences.english: We may run into heavy weather when we learn calculus at first.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛開始學微積分的時候可能會感覺到困難重重。

sentences.english: Why would calculus aces or business consultants make better sperm?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼微積分專家或商業諮詢師的精子會更優良呢？

sentences.english: The course provides an introduction to differential and integral calculus.
sentences.chinese: 本課程主要介紹基本微積分學。

definition: lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
to be strongly determined to succeed (idiom)
colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character
